name: ai-wellness-deployment

scripts.deploy:netlify: cd frontend && npm run build && netlify deploy --prod --dir=dist
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test:integration: curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/predict -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"text\": \"I am feeling happy today\"}"

description: AI-powered wellness application with emotion detection and therapeutic story generation
